sentence.Network_en: I'm a product of the postwar baby boom.
sentence.Network_cn: 我出生在战后的生育高峰期。

sentence.Network_en: During the postwar years in Germany, many honours were heaped upon Einstein.
sentence.Network_cn: 在战后的岁月里,爱因斯坦在德国得到了种种荣誉.

sentence.Network_en: What began as a postwar fetish for sunbathing is rapidly developing into a world health crisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 开始是战后对日光浴的极度迷恋，而后迅速发展成世界性的健康危机。

postvulcanization 二段硫化, postwar 二战后, postvulvar 后子宫

list.abs: ... (prewar 战前的) • 后的： (postwar reconstruction 战后重建) • 非、不： (non-interventionism 不干涉主义) • 充斥的： -.

entry.tran: 战后的；战后不久的；（尤指）第二次世界大战后的
entry.def: Post-war is used to describe things that happened, existed, or were made in the period immediately after a war, especially the Second World War, 1939-45.

example.ex: In the post-war years her writing regularly appeared in The New Journal...
example.tran: 她的文章在战后那几年经常出现在《新日报》上。

example.ex: He really was one of the finest boxers in post-war Britain.
example.tran: 他确实是战后英国最优秀的拳击手之一。

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to the period after a war;

auth_sentence.content: Poverty in the postwar period doomed many a villager.
auth_sentence.res_content: Poverty in the postwar period doomed many a villager.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Poverty in the postwar period doomed many a villager.

auth_sentence.content: The map, she supposes, vanished during postwar looting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The map, she supposes, vanished during postwar looting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The map, she supposes, vanished during postwar looting.

auth_sentence.content: There is no postwar parallel for retrenchment on this scale.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no postwar parallel for retrenchment on this scale.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no postwar parallel for retrenchment on this scale.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"邮件,邮政"; 2. 表示"在后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: post邮件,邮政+al……的→adj.邮政的
post在后面+er+ior……的→后面的
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+hum土+ous……的→入土表示死→死后的
post在后面+war战争→adj.战后的
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post邮件,邮政+age费用→n.邮资
post邮件,邮政+card纸片→n.明信片
post邮件,邮政+er表示东西→n.招贴画,驿站
post邮件,邮政+man人→n.邮差
post邮件,邮政+mark记号→n.邮戳
post邮件,邮政+office办公室→n.邮局
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+er+ity表名词→后面的人→子孙
post在后面+face脸;前面→后面的脸→刊后语
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+script写→写在后面的话
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+pone放→放到后面→推迟

Sentence.sentence: Fortunately, there are a vast number of relatively simple changes that can green older homes, from historic ones like Lincoln's Cottage to your own postwar home.

sentences.en: During the postwar years in Germany,many honours were heaped upon Einstein.
sentences.cn: 在战后的岁月里,爱因斯坦在德国得到了种种荣誉。
